ComicInfo.Summary:
The co-creator of POWERS, and MICE TEMPLAR, MICHAEL AVON OEMING, brings you magic, monsters, and GODS.
Meet Paul, he's an everyday kind of guy. He's kinda tall, kinda strong, and kinda not mortal at all. Paul is actually Apollo (no, really) in hiding... from his family... the ancient Greek gods. Paul's father (you know, Zeus) would rather see Paul dead than living as a mortal... So, for Paul, being a god is a complex... and dangerous...
ComicInfo.Title: DMT
